====== DESCRIPTION ======

After a successful fair in Austin, TX during SXSW, treat gallery is excited to return as an exhibitor to satellite art fair for their inaugural New York City premiere in October of 2019. With this exhibition, we will be raising funds for the New York chapter of the Human Rights Campaign. There is a strong possibility this project will travel to another fair in Miami Beach during Art Basel week.

The #1 goal of treat gallery is to help others. Our exhibitions and partnerships raise funds for charities and non-profit organizations. While the parameters of this application may seem unconventional, please refer to the colorful image on our application as a guide to what we're looking for. The end goal is a colorful, clean rainbow-esque grid from floor to ceiling. Deadline is September 15th.

The content is open, the type of art is open (photography, prints, illustrations, etc) but the art must feature one color in 75% or more of the piece, and it must be a square. No squares? Consider cropping an image for this fundraising event.

Please keep in mind that upon acceptance, we will take your image and make it available in an edition of 5, so if you submit a drawing or an original piece, we will be selling a reproduction of this. We recommend photography, printmaking and digital illustration for this project, but we welcome all submissions. Surprise us! Black and White work is welcome, as long as there is a dominant shade in the work.

*by paying an application fee for this opportunity, you will be exempt from paying any application fees throughout 2020. If you've applied or participated in our #treatamericaproject or satellite art show Austin, reach out to us directly for your waiver.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

You must apply via this form.
https://form.jotform.com/treatgallery/octobersatellite

All questions: info@treatgallery.org

Voted best Art Fair by the Miami New Times, SATELLITE ART SHOW presents interactive projects by young dealers, artist-run spaces and non-profits. By fostering a range of programming, SATELLITE is able to offer patrons and collectors with a unique experience where art is at the forefront of creative expression, activism, and curiosity. Our exhibitors are encouraged to provide our visitors both an opportunity to collect new works of art as well as to present exhibitions that are engaging, experiential and interactive. SATELLITE is expanding perceptions on art and community and providing an inclusive environment for guests to feel comfortable in exploration and discovery.
